description.value: When character succeeds on an Operate Test (or Survival if riding a living steed), they can choose to suffer 1 Fatigue to increase their number of Degrees of Success by Agility Bonus / 2 When character fails on such a test, can choose to suffer 1 Fatigue to reduce their number of Degrees of Failiure by Agility Bonus / 2 (min 1).
